metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9821 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur in AssertWorkerThread due to a race condition with shared workers. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 67.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '67.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
